changes.text: Added quick game tutorial, that appears when the user creates a new game
Added a tips mechanism that helps the user dynamically during the game. This will be expanded in subsequent releases
Added a feedback mechanism to allow users to send feedback to the developers
Authentication/first login has been improved. Now it doesn't require admin approval, and a wellcome email is automatically sent to the user.
Added external market dynamics. Improved market price history management.
New UI look&feel, with different colors. Added Game logo.
Research mechanic: Adjusted the way prototypes are built after the recipe has been unlocked.
Added badge to display pending recipes to unlock in Research tab.
Added fuel requirement to generators, and adjusted generators in general.
Materials will only be consumed once the prototype is built.
